functions.name: firestore_backups_non_public
functions.description: Checks if Firestore backups are non-public.

functions.name: firestore_backup_public_access_restricted
functions.description: Checks if public access to Firestore backups is restricted.

functions.name: firestore_collections_backup_inclusion
functions.description: Checks if Firestore collections are included in backups.

functions.name: firestore_collection_backup_plan_enforced
functions.description: Checks if backup plan is enforced for Firestore collections.

functions.name: firestore_backup_retention_period_set
functions.description: Checks if backup retention period is set for Firestore.

functions.name: firestore_backup_non_public
functions.description: Checks if Firestore backup is non-public.

functions.name: firestore_exports_non_public
functions.description: Checks if Firestore exports are non-public.

functions.name: firestore_collections_pitr_enabled
functions.description: Checks if PITR is enabled for Firestore collections.

functions.name: drive_documents_offline_access_disabled
functions.description: Checks if offline access to drive documents is disabled.

functions.name: documentai_processor_nonpublic_self_owned
functions.description: Checks if DocumentAI processor is non-public and self-owned.

functions.name: documentai_processor_non_public_self_owned
functions.description: Checks if DocumentAI processor is non-public and self-owned.

functions.name: security_command_center_threat_intelligence_collection
functions.description: Checks if threat intelligence collection is enabled in Security Command Center.

functions.name: security_command_center_threat_information_collection
functions.description: Checks if threat information collection is enabled in Security Command Center.

functions.name: security_command_center_incidents_documentation
functions.description: Checks if incidents documentation is enabled in Security Command Center.

functions.name: firestore_api_gateway_logging_enabled
functions.description: Checks if API Gateway logging is enabled for Firestore.

functions.name: firestore_api_https_enabled
functions.description: Checks if HTTPS is enabled for Firestore API.

notes: All functions are based on GCP FIRESTORE API.
Ensure proper IAM permissions are configured.
Consider regional vs global service differences.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
